settings.button_label_1: SAVE $400 & BOOK NOW WITH 3 FREE MONTHS OF ULTRABURN

settings.heading: RESTORE FACIAL VOLUME
settings.title: Cheek Filler
settings.body: In our youth, our faces are rounded with well-hydrated skin. As we mature into adults, the childlike roundness shifts into something more heart-shaped. However, progressing through the decades takes its toll on our facial volume and skin laxity, and our face shape becomes more square. Volume migrates downward, leaving behind hollows. At Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, we can bring back the apples of your cheeks and restore youthful contours to your features.

settings.text: Because HA is naturally occurring to bring the skin nutrients and hydration, most people tolerate JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ very well, without the risk of rejecting the material. If you’re concerned about the loss of facial volume prematurely aging your appearance, schedule a consultation with Balanced Aesthetics Medspa.

The beauty of JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ is that the results are immediate. Once the initial swelling and redness at the injection site subside (in just a few hours), you’ll see the return of your most desired facial contours. The volume of the gel provides instant lift and shape, so the hollows carved in your cheeks by age are gone before you leave Balanced Aesthetics Medspa. You will also notice your lower face is lifted and you’ve regained the overall structure of a youthful face. The effects of JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ will provide you with shapely cheeks and youthful contours for up to 2 years.

settings.question: How Does JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ Work?
settings.answer: While there are many different options in the JUVÉDERM® Family of Fillers, Voluma™is the one thatis most helpful for restoring lost volume in the cheeks. The patented manufacturing process involves cross-linking different weights of hyaluronic acid (HA) molecules together to control the gel’s consistency and cohesiveness. Voluma™ is a more robust gel that won’t spread in a way you don’t want it to. Because HA molecules are a substance the body naturally produces for hydrating the skin, Voluma™ also restores smooth suppleness to your skin’s surface for touchably soft, youthful curves every time.

settings.question: What is JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ Treatment Like?
settings.answer: Your session at Balanced Aesthetics is carried out in the comfort of our offices and takes only 45 minutes to complete. Your injection specialist will carefully map the placement of your JUVÉDERM® Voluma™ filler to achieve the most natural results. Because the formula includes lidocaine, each injection is more comfortable than the last. You’ll be free to return to your routine looking better than ever.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: You may experience some redness, injection site tenderness and swelling, but these resolve within a few hours. You’ll need to take care to avoid activities where your treatment area could be bumped or jostled.

settings.text: It’s difficult to watch the creep of age steal over your facial features and rob you of the plump, rosy cheeks that are the hallmark of a youthful appearance. Now, you don’t have to, thanks to the talented providers at Balanced Aesthetics Medspa and JUVÉDERM® Voluma™.

Don’t forget to use your Allē points to receive discounts on all of your neurotoxin and filler needs!
